pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========================Team and repository tags========================.. image:: https://governance.openstack.org/tc/badges/neutron-fwaas.svg :target: https://governance.openstack.org/tc/reference/tags/index.html.. Change things from this point onWelcome!========This package contains the code for the Neutron Firewall as a Service(FWaaS) service. This package requires Neutron to run.External Resources:===================The homepage for Neutron is: https://launchpad.net/neutron. Use thissite for asking for help, and filing bugs. We use a single Launchpadpage for all Neutron projects.Code is available on git.openstack.org at:<https://opendev.org/openstack/neutron-fwaas>.Please refer to Neutron documentation for more information:`Neutron README.rst <https://opendev.org/openstack/neutron/src/branch/master/README.rst>`_Get release notes:`Neutron FWaaS Release Notes <https://docs.openstack.org/releasenotes/neutron-fwaas/>`_
